H

handleDelete(String, Map<String, String>, String) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Handle Delete HTTP call : Return the Head of the file stored at the path specified in the request line
handleGet(String, Map<String, String>, String) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Handle GET HTTP call : Get the file stored at the path specified in the request line and displays it$ In case the file does not exist, an error 404 message is displayed
handleHead(String, Map<String, String>, String) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Handle Head HTTP call : Return the Head of the file stored at the path specified in the request line
handlePost(String, byte[], Map<String, String>, String) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Handle POST HTTP call : Append content of body to the file stored at the path specified in the request line
handlePut(String, byte[], Map<String, String>, String) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Handle PUT HTTP call : Overwrite content of body to the file stored at the path specified in the request line
http.server - package http.server
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class http.server.WebServer
Start the application.

R

readBody(BufferedInputStream, Map<String, String>) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Reading the request body in case there is one
readHeaders(BufferedInputStream) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Reading the request headers
readRequestLine(BufferedInputStream) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
Reading the first line of the request headers : this line contains the http method to handle, and a path.

S

start(int) - Method in class http.server.WebServer
WebServer constructor.

W

WebServer - Class in http.server
WebServer is a very simple web-server.
WebServer() - Constructor for class http.server.WebServer
